<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A non-existing [[Script]] or script that has finished ([[scriptDone]]). To compare non-existent scripts use [[isNull]] or [[isEqualTo]]:
* <tt>[[scriptNull]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[scriptNull]]; // ERROR! <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> cannot be used with script object</tt>
* <tt>[[isNull]] [[scriptNull]]; // true</tt>
* <tt>[[scriptNull]] [[isEqualTo]] [[scriptNull]]; // true</tt> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''scriptNull''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Script]] - NULL script </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Wait until previous script is finished before starting a new one:<code>[] spawn
{
	_script = [[scriptNull]];
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 10 [[do]] {
		[[waitUntil]] {[[isNull]] _script};
		_script = _i [[spawn]] {
			[[hint]] [[format]] ["script %1 started", _this];
			[[sleep]] 1;
			[[hint]] [[format]] ["script %1 finished", _this];
			[[sleep]] 0.2;
		};
	};
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[scriptDone]] (_obj [[getVariable]] ["objScript", [[scriptNull]]])) [[then]] {
	_obj [[setVariable]] ["objScript", _obj [[spawn]] {
		[[waitUntil]] {[[damage]] _this > 0.9};
		[[hint]] "Critical Damage!";
	}];
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> x3 </name>=<value> <code>[[str]] [[scriptNull]]; // <NULL-script></code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part></template>
